items.name: Guarda Rúnica
items.feature_text: Infuse a personal trinket as a ward held by you or an ally. The holder can spend uma Esperanca to reduce incoming damage by 1d8; if the ward die is 8, the ward ends after reducing damage and can be recharged on your next rest.

items.name: Liberar Caos
items.feature_text: At session start, place tokens equal to your Conjuracao trait. Make a rolagem de Conjuracao against a far target and spend any number of tokens; on success, roll d10s equal to tokens spent for magic damage. Mark um Estresse to replenish tokens; clear unspent tokens at session end.

items.name: Andar na Parede
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to let a touched creature walk on walls and ceilings until the scene ends or you cast Wallwalk again.

items.name: Garra de Cinzas
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao against a melee target. On success, they take 1d20+3 magic damage and are temporarily Em Chamas; when they act while Em Chamas, they take an extra 2d6 magic damage if still burning at the end of their action.

items.name: Olho Flutuante
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to create a small floating orb you can move within very alcance longo and see through. The spell ends if the orb is damaged or leaves range.

items.name: Contrafeitiço
items.feature_text: Interrupt a magical effect by making a reaction roll using your Conjuracao trait. On success, the effect ends, consequences are avoided, and this card is placed in your vault.

items.name: Voo
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (15). On success, place tokens equal to your Agility (min 1). While flying, spend a token on each rolagem de acao; when the last token is spent, you descend.

items.name: Desaparecer num Piscar
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (12). On success, spend uma Esperanca to teleport to a visible point within alcance longo; spend additional Esperanca to bring willing creatures within alcance muito proximo.

items.name: Explosão de Preservação
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao against all targets within alcance corpo a corpo. Targets you succeed against are forced to alcance longo and take d8+3 magic damage using your Conjuracao trait.

items.name: Relâmpago em Cadeia
items.feature_text: Mark 2 Estresse to make a rolagem de Conjuracao affecting all targets within alcance proximo. Targets you succeed against make a reaction roll vs your Conjuracao result; failures take 2d8+4 magic damage. The chain jumps to additional adversaries within alcance proximo of affected targets.

items.name: Premonição
items.feature_text: After the GM gives you the consequences of a roll you made, you can undo that move and make another instead.

items.name: Andarilho da Fenda
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (15). On success, place an arcane mark where you stand; the next time you cast Riftwalker successfully, a rift opens to that mark and stays until closed or another spell replaces it. You can drop the spell to place a new mark.

items.name: Telecinese
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao against a far target. On success, move them anywhere within alcance longo of their original position. You can throw the lifted target at another by making a second rolagem de Conjuracao; on success, deal d12+4 physical damage.

items.name: Tocado pela Arcana
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Arcana cards are in your loadout, gain +1 to Conjuracao Rolls and once per rest you can swap the results of your Esperanca and Medo Dice.

items.name: Explosão de Camuflagem
items.feature_text: After a successful rolagem de Conjuracao to cast another spell, spend uma Esperanca to become Encoberto. While Encoberto, you remain unseen if stationary when an adversary moves to see you; you lose Encoberto when you move into line of sight or attack.

items.name: Reflexão Arcana
items.feature_text: When you would take magic damage, spend any number of Esperanca to roll that many d6s. If any roll a 6, the attack is reflected back at the caster.

items.name: Aura Confusora
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (14). On success, create illusory layers around you. Mark any number of Estresse to add layers. When attacked, roll a d6 per layer; if any are 5+, one layer breaks and the attack fails; otherwise you take the damage and the spell ends.

items.name: Terremoto
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (16). On success, all non-flying targets within very alcance longo make a rolagem de Reacao (18). Failures take 3d10+8 physical damage and are temporarily Vulneravel; successes take half damage. The area becomes difficult terrain and structures may crumble.

items.name: Projeção Sensorial
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (15). On success, you perceive a place you've been before as if you were there. The vision ends if you take damage or cast another spell.

items.name: Ajustar a Realidade
items.feature_text: After you or a willing ally makes a roll, spend 5 Esperanca to change the numeric result to a plausible value of your choice.

items.name: Céu em Queda
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao against all adversaries within alcance longo. Mark any number of Estresse to rain arcane shards; targets you succeed against take 1d20+2 magic damage per Estresse marked.

items.name: Levante-se
items.feature_text: When you take severe damage, you can mark um Estresse to reduce the severity by one threshold.

items.name: Não é Bom o Suficiente
items.feature_text: When you roll your damage dice, you can reroll any 1s or 2s.

items.name: Redemoinho
items.feature_text: After a successful attack within alcance muito proximo, spend uma Esperanca to use the attack against all other targets within alcance muito proximo; additional targets you succeed against take half damage.

items.name: Elogio dos Companheiros
items.feature_text: When you compliment someone or ask about their skill, you both gain 3 Esperanca.

items.name: Imprudente
items.feature_text: Mark um Estresse to gain advantage on an attack.

items.name: Correria
items.feature_text: When a creature within alcance corpo a corpo would deal damage to you, you can avoid the attack and safely move out of their alcance corpo a corpo.

items.name: Combatente Versátil
items.feature_text: You can use a different trait for an equipped weapon. When you deal damage, you can mark um Estresse to use the maximum result of one damage die instead of rolling it.

items.name: Foco Mortal
items.feature_text: Focus on a chosen target; until you attack another creature, defeat the target, or the battle ends, gain +1 Proficiencia.

items.name: Armadura Fortificada
items.feature_text: While wearing armor, gain +2 to your limiares de dano.

items.name: Fio Crítico
items.feature_text: When you critically succeed on an attack, you can spend up to 3 Esperanca; each Esperanca lets you clear a Ponto de Vida, clear an espaco de Armadura, or force the target to mark an additional Ponto de Vida (no option twice).

items.name: Vitalidade
items.feature_text: Permanently gain two benefits: one Estresse slot, one Ponto de Vida slot, or +2 to limiares de dano. Place this card in your vault permanently.

items.name: Endurecido pela Batalha
items.feature_text: When you would make a Death Move, spend uma Esperanca to clear a Ponto de Vida instead.

items.name: Aumentar a Fúria
items.feature_text: Before an attack, mark um Estresse to gain a damage bonus equal to twice your Strength. You can Rage Up twice per attack.

items.name: Tocado pela Lâmina
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Blade cards are in your loadout, gain +2 to attack rolls and +4 to your limiar de dano severo.

items.name: Golpe de Raspão
items.feature_text: When you fail an attack, you can mark um Estresse to deal weapon damage using half your Proficiencia.

items.name: Grito de Batalha
items.feature_text: While charging into danger, rally allies who can hear you: they clear um Estresse and gain uma Esperanca, and gain advantage on attack rolls until you or an ally rolls a failure with Medo.

items.name: Frenesi
items.feature_text: Enter a Frenzy until no adversaries are in sight. While Frenzied, you cannot use Armadura Slots and gain +10 to damage rolls and +8 to your limiar de dano severo.

items.name: Sangue e Glória
items.feature_text: When you critically succeed on a weapon attack, gain uma Esperanca or clear um Estresse. When you defeat an enemy, gain uma Esperanca or clear um Estresse.

items.name: Golpe de Execução
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to make an attack roll. The GM tells you which targets within range it would hit; choose one and force them to mark 5 Pontos de Vida.

items.name: Monstro de Batalha
items.feature_text: When you successfully attack, you can mark 4 Estresse to force the target to mark Pontos de Vida equal to the number of Pontos de Vida you currently have marked instead of rolling damage.

items.name: Investida
items.feature_text: When you successfully attack, you never deal damage below a target's limiar maior (minimum 2 Pontos de Vida). When a creature within your weapon range damages an ally without including you, you can mark um Estresse to force a rolagem de Reacao (15); on failure, the target marks a Ponto de Vida.

items.name: Manobras Ágeis
items.feature_text: Mark um Estresse to sprint anywhere within alcance longo without an Agility roll. If you end in alcance corpo a corpo and attack immediately, gain +1 to the attack roll.

items.name: Eu Vi Chegar
items.feature_text: When targeted by an attack from beyond alcance corpo a corpo, mark um Estresse to roll a d4 and add it to your Evasao against the attack.

items.name: Intocável
items.feature_text: Gain an Evasao bonus equal to half your Agility.

items.name: Ferocidade
items.feature_text: When you cause an adversary to mark Pontos de Vida, spend 2 Esperanca to increase your Evasao by the number of Pontos de Vida they marked until after the next attack against you.

items.name: Abordagem Estratégica
items.feature_text: After a long rest, place tokens equal to your Knowledge (min 1). The first time you move within alcance proximo of an adversary and attack, spend a token to gain advantage, clear um Estresse on an ally within alcance corpo a corpo of that adversary, or add a d8 to your damage roll. Clear tokens on long rest.

items.name: Firmar-se
items.feature_text: When you mark an espaco de Armadura to reduce incoming damage, you can mark um Estresse to mark an additional espaco de Armadura.

items.name: Tático
items.feature_text: When you Help an Ally, they can spend uma Esperanca to add one of your Experiences to their roll alongside your advantage die. When making a Tag Team Roll, you can roll a d20 as your Dado de Esperanca.

items.name: Impulso
items.feature_text: Mark um Estresse to vault off a willing ally within alcance proximo and make an aerial attack against a far target with advantage; add a d10 to the damage roll and end within alcance corpo a corpo of the target.

items.name: Redirecionar
items.feature_text: When an attack from beyond alcance corpo a corpo fails against you, roll d6s equal to your Proficiencia. If any are 6, you can mark um Estresse to redirect the attack to an adversary within alcance muito proximo.

items.name: Conheça Seu Inimigo
items.feature_text: Observe a creature and make an Instinct Roll. On success, spend uma Esperanca to ask the GM one set of details: HP/Estresse, Difficulty/thresholds, tactics/attack dice, or features/Experiences. You can also mark um Estresse to remove a Medo from the GM's pool.

items.name: Golpe Assinatura
items.feature_text: Name a signature move. When you perform it as part of an action, you can roll a d20 as your Dado de Esperanca; on success, clear um Estresse.

items.name: Riposta Rápida
items.feature_text: When an attack against you from within alcance corpo a corpo fails, mark um Estresse to deal the weapon damage of one of your active weapons to the attacker.

items.name: Recuperação
items.feature_text: During a short rest, you can choose a long rest downtime move instead. You can spend uma Esperanca to let an ally do the same.

items.name: Tocado pelo Osso
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Bone cards are in your loadout, gain +1 Agility and once per rest you can spend 3 Esperanca to make a successful attack against you fail instead.

items.name: Precisão Cruel
items.feature_text: When you successfully attack with a weapon, gain a damage bonus equal to your Finesse or Agility.

items.name: Golpe Quebrador
items.feature_text: When you make a successful attack, you can mark um Estresse so the next successful attack against that target deals an extra 2d12 damage.

items.name: Domar
items.feature_text: Make an Agility Roll against all targets within alcance proximo. Spend uma Esperanca to move targets you succeed against, and willing allies within alcance proximo, to another point within alcance proximo.

items.name: À Beira
items.feature_text: When you have 2 or fewer Pontos de Vida unmarked, you do not take Minor damage.

items.name: Golpe Estilhaçante
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca and attack all adversaries within your weapon range. On a success against any targets, roll weapon damage and distribute it among those targets; before each target takes damage, roll an additional damage die and add it.

items.name: Corrida da Morte
items.feature_text: Spend 3 Esperanca to run a straight path to a point within alcance longo, attacking all adversaries within your weapon range along the path. Roll weapon damage with +1 Proficiencia for the first target, then remove one damage die for each subsequent target.

items.name: Passo Veloz
items.feature_text: When an attack against you fails, clear um Estresse; if you cannot, gain uma Esperanca.

items.name: Códice de Força e Gelo
items.feature_text: Power Push: Conjuracao vs melee target to knock them to alcance longo and deal d10+2 magic damage. Tava's Armadura: spend uma Esperanca to give a touched target +1 Valor de Armadura until next rest or recast. Ice Spike: Conjuracao (12) to summon a spike within alcance longo; if used as a weapon, deal d6 physical damage on success.

items.name: Códice de Sono e Mente
items.feature_text: Slumber: Conjuracao vs very close target; on success they sleep until damaged or the GM spends Medo. Arcane Barrage: once per rest, spend any Esperanca to deal d6 magic damage per Esperanca to a close target. Telepathy: spend uma Esperanca to open mental communication with a visible target until next rest or recast.

items.name: Códice de Chama e Névoa
items.feature_text: Wild Flame: Conjuracao vs up to three melee adversaries; on success they take 2d6 magic damage and mark um Estresse. Magic Hand: conjure a magical hand within alcance longo. Mysterious Mist: Conjuracao (13) to create dense fog in a very close area that heavily obscures.

items.name: Códice de Ilusões
items.feature_text: Adjust Appearance: magically shift appearance and clothing. Parallela: spend 2 Esperanca on self or ally within alcance proximo so their next attack can hit an additional target their roll would succeed against (only one active at a time). Illusion: Conjuracao (14) to create a visual illusion within alcance proximo that lasts while you watch it.

items.name: Códice de Selos e Portais
items.feature_text: Runic Lock: Conjuracao (15) on a closeable object; once per rest on success, lock it so only chosen creatures can open. Arcane Door: when no adversaries within melee, Conjuracao (13) to create a portal to a visible far point; closes after a creature passes. Reveal: Conjuracao to reveal anything magically hidden within alcance proximo.

items.name: Códice de Runas e Levitação
items.feature_text: Levitation: Conjuracao to lift a visible target and move them within alcance proximo of their original position. Recant: spend uma Esperanca to force a melee target to make a rolagem de Reacao (15); on failure they forget the last minute. Rune Circle: mark um Estresse to create a circle that deals 2d12+4 magic damage to adversaries in alcance corpo a corpo and knocks them to alcance muito proximo.

items.name: Códice de Laços e Fogo
items.feature_text: Mystic Tether: Conjuracao vs a far target; on success they are temporarily Restringido and mark um Estresse, grounding flying targets. Fireball: Conjuracao vs a very far target; on success, the target and creatures within alcance muito proximo make a rolagem de Reacao (13), taking d20+5 magic damage on failure or half on success.

items.name: Códice de Construtos e Proteção
items.feature_text: Repudiate: once per rest, make a reaction roll to interrupt a magical effect; on success, it ends. Create Construct: spend uma Esperanca to animate nearby objects into a construct that follows basic commands; Conjuracao to command it. It shares your Evasao and traits, deals 2d10+3 physical damage, and falls apart if damaged; only one at a time.

items.name: Códice de Guardas e Tempo
items.feature_text: Arcane Deflection: once per long rest, spend uma Esperanca to negate damage from an attack targeting you or an ally within alcance muito proximo. Time Lock: freeze an object within alcance longo until your next rest; maintain with Conjuracao if moved. Wall of Flame: Conjuracao (15) to create a wall of flame between two far points; anything passing through takes 4d10+3 magic damage.

items.name: Manifestar Muralha
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (15). On success, spend uma Esperanca to create a magical wall between two far points, up to 50 feet high. Creatures or objects in its path are shunted aside. The wall lasts until your next rest or you cast it again.

items.name: Teleporte
items.feature_text: Teleport yourself and willing targets within alcance proximo to a place you've been before. Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (16) with a modifier based on your familiarity; on success you arrive as intended, on failure you appear off course.

items.name: Banir
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a close target; on success roll d20s equal to your Conjuracao trait. The target makes a reaction roll against your highest result; on success they mark um Estresse, on failure they are banished. When PCs roll with Medo, the difficulty drops by 1 and the target rolls again to return.

items.name: Sigilo Vingativo
items.feature_text: Mark a close adversary with a retribution sigil; the GM gains a Medo. When they damage you or allies, place a d8 on this card (up to your level). When you hit the marked adversary, roll those dice and add the total to your damage, then clear the dice. The effect ends when the target is defeated or you recast.

items.name: Códice de Passagem
items.feature_text: Pass Through: Conjuracao (13); once per rest on success, you and all touching you can pass through a wall or door within alcance proximo. Plane Gate: Conjuracao (14); once per long rest on success, open a gateway to a known location on another plane until your next rest.

items.name: Tocado pelo Códice
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Codex cards are in your loadout, you can mark um Estresse to add your Proficiencia to a rolagem de Conjuracao and once per rest replace this card with any card from your vault without paying its Recall Cost.

items.name: Códice da Memória
items.feature_text: Memory Delve: Conjuracao vs a far target; on success, ask the GM a question and see memories tied to the answer. Shared Clarity: once per long rest, spend uma Esperanca to link two willing creatures so either can mark Estresse for the other until next rest.

items.name: Refúgio Seguro
items.feature_text: With a few minutes of calm, spend 2 Esperanca to summon a safe interdimensional home. A magical door appears within alcance proximo; only chosen creatures can enter, and you can hide the entrance. Resting inside grants an additional downtime move; the doorway must be resummoned after you leave.

items.name: Códice da Transformação
items.feature_text: Transform: Conjuracao (15) to become an inanimate object up to twice your size until you take damage. Eternal Enervation: once per long rest, Conjuracao vs a close target; on success they become permanently Vulneravel.

items.name: Onda de Desintegração
items.feature_text: Make a rolagem de Conjuracao (18). On success, the GM tells you which adversaries within alcance longo have Difficulty 18 or lower. Mark um Estresse for each you choose; they are killed and cannot be brought back.

items.name: Códice da Ruptura do Tempo
items.feature_text: Timejammer: Conjuracao (18) to halt time for everyone within alcance longo except you; it resumes after your next action targeting another creature. Magic Immunity: spend 5 Esperanca to become immune to magic damage until your next rest.

items.name: União Transcendente
items.feature_text: Spend 5 Esperanca to link two or more willing creatures until your next rest. When any linked creature would mark Estresse or Pontos de Vida, the group chooses who marks it.

items.name: Enganador Ágil
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to gain advantage on a roll to deceive or trick someone into believing a lie.

items.name: Encantar
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a close target; on success they become temporarily Enrapturado, focusing only on you. Once per rest on a success, you can mark um Estresse to force the Enrapturado target to mark um Estresse.

items.name: Palavras Inspiradoras
items.feature_text: After a long rest, place tokens equal to your Presence. When you speak with an ally, spend a token to let them clear um Estresse, clear a Ponto de Vida, or gain uma Esperanca. Clear unspent tokens on a long rest.

items.name: Não Conte Mentiras
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a very close target; on success they cannot lie while within alcance proximo. If they refuse to answer a question, they mark um Estresse and the effect ends.

items.name: Criador de Encrenca
items.feature_text: Taunt a far target and make a Presence Roll. On success, roll d4s equal to your Proficiencia; the target marks Estresse equal to the highest result.

items.name: Brilho Hipnótico
items.feature_text: Conjuracao against all adversaries in front of you within alcance proximo. On success, they mark um Estresse and are temporarily Atordoado, unable to act or react until they clear the condition.

items.name: Invisibilidade
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (10). On success, mark um Estresse to make yourself or an ally within alcance corpo a corpo Invisivel. Place tokens equal to your Conjuracao trait; spend a token each time the Invisivel creature takes an action. The effect ends when the last token is spent; only one creature can be Invisivel at a time.

items.name: Discurso Acalmante
items.feature_text: During a short rest, when you use Tend to Wounds on another character, they clear one additional Ponto de Vida and you clear 2 Pontos de Vida.

items.name: Pelos Seus Olhos
items.feature_text: Choose a target within very alcance longo; you can see and hear through them until you cast another spell or take your next rest.

items.name: Explorador de Pensamentos
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to read a far target's surface thoughts. Make a rolagem de Conjuracao against them to delve deeper; on a roll with Medo, they may realize you're reading their thoughts.

items.name: Palavras de Discórdia
items.feature_text: Whisper discord to a melee adversary and Conjuracao (13). On success, they mark um Estresse and must attack another adversary instead. The next time you cast this on them, you take a -5 penalty to the rolagem de Conjuracao.

items.name: Nunca Ofuscado
items.feature_text: When you mark Pontos de Vida from an attack, you can mark um Estresse to place tokens equal to the Pontos de Vida marked. On your next successful attack, gain +5 damage per token and then clear the tokens.

items.name: Compartilhar o Fardo
items.feature_text: Take on Estresse from a willing creature within alcance corpo a corpo. Transfer any number of their marked Estresse to you and gain uma Esperanca for each transferred Estresse.

items.name: Carisma Infinito
items.feature_text: After you make an rolagem de acao to persuade, lie, or gain favor, spend uma Esperanca to reroll your Esperanca or Dado de Medo.

items.name: Tocado pela Graça
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Grace cards are in your loadout, you can mark an espaco de Armadura instead of Estresse, and when you would force a target to mark Pontos de Vida you can instead force them to mark that much Estresse.

items.name: Projeção Astral
items.feature_text: Mark um Estresse to create a projected copy of yourself at a place you've been before. You can see and hear through it and act as if you were there; it lasts until your next rest or it takes damage.

items.name: Encantamento em Massa
items.feature_text: Conjuracao against all targets within alcance longo. Targets you succeed against become temporarily Enrapturado. You can mark um Estresse to force all Enrapturado targets to mark um Estresse, ending the spell.

items.name: Imitador
items.feature_text: Mimic a domain card of level 8 or lower from another player's loadout. Spend Esperanca equal to half the card's level to gain its feature until your next rest or they vault the card.

items.name: Mestre do Ofício
items.feature_text: Permanently gain +2 to two Experiences or +3 to one Experience. Place this card in your vault permanently.

items.name: Bis
items.feature_text: When an ally within alcance proximo deals damage to an adversary, make a rolagem de Conjuracao against that target. On success, you deal the same damage; on success with Medo, place this card in your vault.

items.name: Notório
items.feature_text: Leverage your notoriety: mark um Estresse before a roll to gain +10 to the result. Food and drink are free; other purchases cost one bag of gold less (min one handful). This card does not count against your loadout and cannot be vaulted.

items.name: Pegar e Puxar
items.feature_text: Gain advantage on action rolls to pick nonmagical locks, disarm nonmagical traps, or steal items from a target.

items.name: Tempestade de Lâminas
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to make a rolagem de Conjuracao and conjure throwing blades at all targets within alcance muito proximo. Targets you succeed against take d8+2 magic damage; Vulneravel targets take an extra 1d8 damage.

items.name: Disfarce Inquietante
items.feature_text: With a few minutes to prepare, mark um Estresse to disguise yourself as a humanoid you can picture. Gain advantage on Presence rolls to avoid scrutiny. Place tokens equal to your Conjuracao trait; spend a token on each action while disguised.

items.name: Espírito da Meia-Noite
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to summon a humanoid-sized spirit until your next rest. You can command it with Conjuracao; it can attack a far target, moving to alcance corpo a corpo and dealing d6s of magic damage equal to your Conjuracao trait before dissipating. Only one spirit at a time.

items.name: Vincular Sombras
items.feature_text: Conjuracao against all adversaries within alcance muito proximo; targets you succeed against are temporarily Restringido.

items.name: Estrangulamento
items.feature_text: When behind a creature your size, mark um Estresse to put them in a chokehold, making them temporarily Vulneravel. Attacks against them while Vulneravel deal an extra 2d6 damage.

items.name: Véu da Noite
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (13) to create a curtain of darkness between two far points. Only you can see through it; you are Oculto to adversaries on the other side and gain advantage on attacks through the veil.

items.name: Especialista em Furtividade
items.feature_text: When you roll with Medo while moving unnoticed through danger, you can mark um Estresse to roll with Esperanca instead. If an ally within alcance proximo rolls with Medo, you can mark um Estresse to change their result to Esperanca.

items.name: Glifo do Ocaso
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a very close target. On success, spend uma Esperanca to mark them with a dark glyph that reduces their Difficulty by your Knowledge (min 1) temporarily.

items.name: Silêncio
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a close target. On success, spend uma Esperanca to create a silencing field that follows them within alcance muito proximo. The field ends when the GM spends a Medo, you recast, or you take major damage; while Silenciado, targets cannot make noise or cast spells.

items.name: Retirada Fantasma
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to mark your current position. Before your next rest, spend another Esperanca to vanish and reappear at the marked point, ending the spell.

items.name: Sussurros Sombrios
items.feature_text: You can speak into the mind of anyone you've touched. You can mark um Estresse to Conjuracao against them; on success, ask the GM one question about their location, actions, fears, or what they cherish most.

items.name: Disfarce em Massa
items.feature_text: With a few minutes of silence, mark um Estresse to disguise all willing creatures within alcance proximo. Forms share a general size and structure. Disguised creatures gain advantage on Presence rolls to avoid scrutiny. Activate a Countdown (8); when it triggers, the disguise drops.

items.name: Tocado pela Meia-Noite
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Midnight cards are in your loadout, once per rest when you have 0 Esperanca and the GM would gain a Medo, you can gain uma Esperanca instead; when you hit, you can mark um Estresse to add your Dado de Medo result to your damage roll.

items.name: Esquiva Desaparecente
items.feature_text: When a physical attack against you fails, spend uma Esperanca to become Oculto and teleport to a point within alcance proximo of the attacker. You remain Oculto until your next rolagem de acao.

items.name: Caçador de Sombras
items.feature_text: While in low light or darkness, gain +1 Evasao and make attack rolls with advantage.

items.name: Carga de Feitiço
items.feature_text: When you take magic damage, place tokens equal to Pontos de Vida marked (up to your Conjuracao trait). When you hit a target, spend any number of tokens to add a d6 per token to the damage roll.

items.name: Terror Noturno
items.feature_text: Targets within alcance muito proximo must make a rolagem de Reacao (16) or become Aterrorizado and Vulneravel. Steal Medo from the GM equal to the number of Aterrorizado targets, roll that many d6s, and deal that total damage to each Aterrorizado target.

items.name: Toque do Crepúsculo
items.feature_text: Choose a far target. Each time you succeed on a non-damage rolagem de acao against them, place a token. When you deal damage to that target, spend tokens to add a d12 per token to the damage roll. Clear tokens when you choose a new target or take a rest.

items.name: Eclipse
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (16). On success, plunge the area within alcance longo into darkness only you and your allies can see through. Attacks against you or allies in the shadow have disadvantage. When you or an ally succeeds with Esperanca in the shadow, the target marks um Estresse. The effect ends when the GM spends a Medo or you take severe damage.

items.name: Espectro da Escuridão
items.feature_text: Mark um Estresse to become Espectral until you make an rolagem de acao targeting another creature. While Espectral, you are immune to physical damage and can pass through solid objects.

items.name: Rastreador Talentoso
items.feature_text: When tracking a creature or group by their signs, spend any number of Esperanca to ask that many questions about their direction, timing, actions, or count. When you meet tracked creatures, gain +1 Evasao against them.

items.name: Fala Selvagem
items.feature_text: Speak with plants and animals by making an Instinct Roll (12). On success they share what they know; on a roll with Medo, information may be limited or costly. Before a rolagem de Conjuracao in a natural environment, you can spend uma Esperanca for +2 to the roll.

items.name: Enredar Vicioso
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a far target; on success, deal 1d8+1 physical damage and temporarily Restrain them. You can spend uma Esperanca to also Restrain another adversary within alcance muito proximo of the target.

items.name: Conjurar Enxame
items.feature_text: Choose a swarm: Tekaira Armored Beetles (mark um Estresse; next damage you take is reduced by one threshold, and you can spend uma Esperanca to keep them after taking damage) or Fire Flies (Conjuracao vs all adversaries within alcance proximo; spend uma Esperanca to deal 2d8+3 magic damage to targets you succeeded against).

items.name: Familiar Natural
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to summon a small nature spirit or critter until next rest, recast, or it is attacked. Spend another Esperanca to give it flight. Conjuracao to command tasks and mark um Estresse to see through its eyes. When you damage an adversary in alcance corpo a corpo of your familiar, add a d6 to your damage roll.

items.name: Projétil Corrosivo
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a far target; on success, deal d6+4 magic damage. Mark 2 or more Estresse to make them permanently Corroido; while Corroido, they take a -1 Difficulty penalty per 2 Estresse spent (stacks).

items.name: Talos Elevados
items.feature_text: Conjure a climbable stalk within alcance proximo that can grow up to alcance longo high. You can mark um Estresse to use it as an attack: Conjuracao against adversaries within alcance proximo; on success, lift and drop them for d8 physical damage.

items.name: Aperto da Morte
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a close target. On success, choose one: pull them to melee or pull yourself to them; force them to mark 2 Estresse; or strike all adversaries between you and the target for 3d6+2 physical damage on a failed rolagem de Reacao (13). The target is temporarily Restringido.

items.name: Campo de Cura
items.feature_text: Conjure a healing field within alcance proximo; you and allies in the area clear 1 Ponto de Vida. Spend 2 Esperanca to clear 2 Pontos de Vida instead.

items.name: Pele de Espinhos
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to sprout thorns and place tokens equal to your Conjuracao trait. When you take damage, spend any number of tokens to roll that many d6s and reduce incoming damage by the total; if in alcance corpo a corpo of the attacker, deal that much damage back. Clear tokens on rest.

items.name: Fortaleza Selvagem
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (13). On success, spend 2 Esperanca to grow a dome-shaped barricade that you and one ally can shelter within. Creatures inside cannot be targeted or attack; attacks against the dome automatically succeed. The dome has thresholds 15/30 and lasts until it marks 3 Pontos de Vida.

items.name: Montarias Conjuradas
items.feature_text: Spend any number of Esperanca to conjure that many magical steeds until your next long rest or they take damage. Steeds double travel speed and allow far-range movement without rolls, but riders take -2 to attack rolls and +2 to damage rolls.

items.name: Forrageador
items.feature_text: Gain a downtime move to forage. Roll a d6 to find a consumable: unique food (clear 2 Estresse), beautiful relic (gain 2 Esperanca), arcane rune (+2 rolagem de Conjuracao), healing vial (clear 2 Pontos de Vida), luck charm (reroll any die), or choose one. The party can carry up to five foraged consumables.

items.name: Tocado pelo Sábio
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Sage cards are in your loadout, gain +2 to Conjuracao Rolls while in a natural environment and once per rest you can double your Agility or Instinct for a roll (declare before rolling).

items.name: Surto Selvagem
items.feature_text: Mark um Estresse to awaken wild power and place a Wild Surge Die (d6) set to 1. Add its value to every rolagem de acao; after each use, increase it by 1. When it would exceed 6 or you rest, the form ends and you mark an additional Estresse.

items.name: Espíritos da Floresta
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (13). On success, spend any number of Esperanca to create that many sprites within alcance longo. Allies gain +3 to attack rolls against adversaries within alcance corpo a corpo of a sprite; allies within alcance corpo a corpo of a sprite can mark an additional espaco de Armadura when they mark one. Sprites vanish after granting a benefit or taking damage.

items.name: Barreira de Rejuvenescimento
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (15). On success, create a protective barrier at alcance muito proximo around you. You and allies within clear 1d4 Pontos de Vida. While the barrier is up, you and allies within resist physical damage from outside; it moves with you.

items.name: Santuário dos Ermos
items.feature_text: After a long rest, place tokens equal to the number of Sage cards in your loadout and vault. After you make a rolagem de Conjuracao, spend any number of tokens to gain +1 per token. When you critically succeed on a Sage rolagem de Conjuracao, gain a token. Clear tokens on long rest.

items.name: Domínio das Plantas
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (18). On success, reshape plant life within alcance longo (grow trees, clear paths, or form walls of roots).

items.name: Força da Natureza
items.feature_text: Mark um Estresse to transform into a hulking nature spirit. Gain +10 damage when you succeed on attacks or Conjuracao Rolls, clear an espaco de Armadura when you defeat a creature within alcance proximo, and cannot be Restringido. Before each rolagem de acao, spend uma Esperanca or revert.

items.name: Tempestade
items.feature_text: Choose a tempest and Conjuracao against all targets within alcance longo; on success, effects last until the GM spends a Medo. Blizzard: 2d20+8 magic damage and targets are temporarily Vulneravel. Hurricane: 3d10+10 magic damage and targets cannot move against the wind. Sandstorm: 5d6+9 magic damage and attacks from beyond alcance corpo a corpo have disadvantage.

items.name: Farol de Raio
items.feature_text: Conjuracao vs a far target; on success, spend uma Esperanca to deal d8+2 magic damage. The target becomes temporarily Vulneravel and glows until the condition ends.

items.name: Toque Restaurador
items.feature_text: With a few minutes of focus, spend 2 Esperanca to clear 1 Ponto de Vida or 1 Estresse on a creature. Once per long rest, if you learn something new about them or reveal something about yourself during the healing, clear 2 Pontos de Vida or 2 Estresse instead.

items.name: Reafirmação
items.feature_text: After an ally makes an rolagem de acao but before consequences, you can offer support; they reroll their dice.

items.name: Palavras Finais
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (13) to speak with a corpse. On success with Esperanca, it answers up to three questions; on success with Medo, it answers one. The corpse answers truthfully, then turns to dust.

items.name: Mãos Curativas
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (13) and target a creature within alcance corpo a corpo other than yourself. On success, mark um Estresse to clear 2 Pontos de Vida or 2 Estresse; on failure, mark um Estresse to clear 1 Ponto de Vida or 1 Estresse. You cannot heal the same target again until your next long rest.

items.name: Segundo Fôlego
items.feature_text: When you succeed on an attack, clear 3 Estresse or 1 Ponto de Vida. On a success with Esperanca, you also clear 3 Estresse or 1 Ponto de Vida on an ally within alcance proximo.

items.name: Voz da Razão
items.feature_text: Gain advantage on action rolls to de-escalate violence or convince someone to follow your lead. When all Estresse slots are marked, you gain +1 Proficiencia for damage rolls.

items.name: Adivinhação
items.feature_text: Spend 3 Esperanca to ask one yes-or-no question about the near future and receive the answer in a brief vision.

items.name: Guarda da Vida
items.feature_text: Spend 3 Esperanca and choose an ally within alcance proximo. When they would make a Death Move, they clear a Ponto de Vida instead. The effect ends after saving them, when you cast Lifeward on another target, or after a long rest.

items.name: Moldar Material
items.feature_text: Spend uma Esperanca to shape natural material you are touching (stone, ice, wood) within alcance proximo into a simple tool or structure.

items.name: Golpe Divino
items.feature_text: Spend 3 Esperanca to charge a smite. The next time you hit with a weapon, double the damage roll; it deals magic damage regardless of weapon type.

items.name: Restauração
items.feature_text: After a long rest, place tokens equal to your Conjuracao trait. Touch a creature and spend tokens to clear 2 Pontos de Vida or 2 Estresse per token; you can also spend a token to clear Vulneravel or heal an ailment. Clear unspent tokens on a long rest.

items.name: Zona de Proteção
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (16). On success, create a zone at a far point for allies within alcance muito proximo. Place a d6 set to 1; when an ally in the zone takes damage, reduce it by the die's value and increase the die by 1. When it would exceed 6, the effect ends.

items.name: Golpe Curativo
items.feature_text: When you deal damage to an adversary, you can spend 2 Esperanca to clear a Ponto de Vida on an ally within alcance proximo.

items.name: Tocado pelo Esplendor
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Splendor cards are in your loadout, gain +3 to your limiar de dano severo and once per long rest you can choose to mark Estresse or spend Esperanca instead of marking Pontos de Vida.

items.name: Aura de Escudo
items.feature_text: Mark um Estresse to cast a protective aura on a creature within alcance muito proximo. When they mark an espaco de Armadura, reduce the severity by an additional threshold. If the aura prevents all Ponto de Vida damage from an attack, the effect ends. Only one creature can have Shield Aura at a time.

items.name: Luz Solar Atordoante
items.feature_text: Conjuracao to unleash rays against all adversaries in front of you within alcance longo. On success, spend any number of Esperanca to force that many targets to make a rolagem de Reacao (14). Success: 3d20+3 magic damage; failure: 4d20+5 magic damage and temporarily Atordoado.

items.name: Aura Avassaladora
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (15). On success, spend 2 Esperanca to set your Presence equal to your Conjuracao trait until your next long rest. While active, an adversary must mark um Estresse when they target you with an attack.

items.name: Raio de Salvação
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (16). On success, mark any number of Estresse to target a line of allies within alcance longo. Clear Pontos de Vida equal to Estresse marked, divided among them as you choose.

items.name: Revigoramento
items.feature_text: When you or an ally within alcance proximo uses a feature with an exhaustion limit, spend any number of Esperanca and roll that many d6s. If any roll a 6, the feature can be used again.

items.name: Ressurreição
items.feature_text: Conjuracao (20) to restore a creature dead no longer than 100 years to full strength. Then roll a d6; on 5 or lower, place this card in your vault permanently. On failure, you cannot cast Resurrection for a week.

items.name: O Básico
items.feature_text: When you choose not to equip armor, your base Valor de Armadura becomes 3 + Strength and your base thresholds are Tier 1: 9/19, Tier 2: 11/24, Tier 3: 13/31, Tier 4: 15/38.

items.name: Empurrão Poderoso
items.feature_text: Make a primary weapon attack against a melee target. On success, deal damage and knock them to alcance proximo; on success with Esperanca, add a d6 to damage. You can spend uma Esperanca to make them temporarily Vulneravel.

items.name: Eu Sou Seu Escudo
items.feature_text: When an ally within alcance muito proximo would take damage, mark um Estresse to become the target instead. When you take damage from this attack, you can mark any number of Armadura Slots.

items.name: Esmaga-Corpos
items.feature_text: On a successful attack with a melee weapon, gain a damage bonus equal to your Strength.

items.name: Presença Ousada
items.feature_text: When you make a Presence Roll, you can spend uma Esperanca to add your Strength to the roll. Once per rest, when you would gain a condition, describe how your bold presence helps and avoid the condition.

items.name: Inspiração Crítica
items.feature_text: When you critically succeed on an attack, all allies within alcance muito proximo can clear um Estresse or gain uma Esperanca.

items.name: Apoie-se em Mim
items.feature_text: When you console or inspire an ally who failed an rolagem de acao, you both clear 2 Estresse.

items.name: Incite-os
items.feature_text: Taunt a target within alcance proximo and make a Presence Roll. On success, they mark um Estresse and the next time the GM spotlights them they must target you with an attack made with disadvantage.

items.name: Tanque de Suporte
items.feature_text: When an ally within alcance proximo fails a roll, spend 2 Esperanca to let them reroll their Esperanca or Dado de Medo.

items.name: Armeiro
items.feature_text: While wearing armor, gain +1 Valor de Armadura. During a rest, when you repair your armor as a downtime move, your allies also clear an espaco de Armadura.

items.name: Golpe Estimulante
items.feature_text: When you critically succeed on an attack, you and allies who can see or hear you clear a Ponto de Vida or 1d4 Estresse.

items.name: Inevitável
items.feature_text: When you fail an rolagem de acao, your next rolagem de acao has advantage.

items.name: Erga-se
items.feature_text: Gain a bonus to your severe threshold equal to your Proficiencia. When you mark Pontos de Vida from an attack, clear um Estresse.

items.name: Dê de Ombros
items.feature_text: When you would take damage, you can mark um Estresse to reduce its severity by one threshold. Then roll a d6; on 3 or lower, place this card in your vault.

items.name: Tocado pelo Valor
items.feature_text: If 4 or more Valor cards are in your loadout, gain +1 Valor de Armadura and when you mark Pontos de Vida without marking an espaco de Armadura, clear an espaco de Armadura.

items.name: Surto Total
items.feature_text: Mark 3 Estresse to gain +2 to all character traits until your next rest.

items.name: Golpe no Chão
items.feature_text: Spend 2 Esperanca to make a Strength Roll against all targets within alcance muito proximo. Targets you succeed against are thrown to alcance longo and make a rolagem de Reacao (17); failures take 4d10+8 damage and successes take half.

items.name: Segure a Linha
items.feature_text: Describe your defensive stance and spend uma Esperanca. If an adversary moves within alcance muito proximo, they are pulled into alcance corpo a corpo and Restringido until you move, fail with Medo, or the GM spends 2 Medo to clear the condition.

items.name: Lidere pelo Exemplo
items.feature_text: When you deal damage to an adversary, mark um Estresse to encourage allies. The next PC to attack that adversary can clear um Estresse or gain uma Esperanca.

items.name: Inquebrável
items.feature_text: When you mark your last Ponto de Vida, instead of making a Death Move, roll a d6 and clear that many Pontos de Vida, then place this card in your vault.

items.name: Armadura Inabalável
items.feature_text: When you would mark an espaco de Armadura, roll d6s equal to your Proficiencia. If any roll a 6, reduce the severity by one threshold without marking an espaco de Armadura.
